comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: Eric Belfield was born in King's Norton, birth reg. the 3rd quarter of 1891. (FreeBMD) Special Reserve of Officers Infantry Bth Battalion, The Duke of Cambridge's Own (Middlesex Regiment), Second Lieutenant (on probation) Eric Belfield is confirmed in his rank. London Gazette 18 June, 1912. Captain Eric Belfield married Valerie Ermyntrude Morris, daughter of Sir Robert Armine Morris, 4th Bt. and Lucy Augusta Cory, on 20 February 1917. [The marriage was in Swansea (FreeBMD)] He was killed in action on 31 July 1917 - The Duke of Cambridge's Own (Middlesex Regiment) His widow married 2nd Major Thomas Chalmers Bowie, MB, RAMC, of Lindisfarne, Gullane, E Lothian on 12 October 1922. thepeerage.com/p51720.htm
